title: Moving emails between folders
creator: wessimmons2001
content: I have accidentally deleted some emails on the Android app. They have moved into a folder called Trash. I want to move them back to the Inbox. When I select an email and press the more button I only get options to select all or star the email. When I select all the emails I get options to delete, mark as read or star. The emails are not available when I look at this account on Thunderbird desktop. How do I get them back to my Inbox?
metadata: ;useragent:Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/134.0.0.0 Safari/537.36;os:android
